resources.string: "Unfortunately, something went wrong. Please try again later."

"You have successfully updated your e-mail address."

"I have read and agree to the %s"
"I have read and agree to the Terms & Conditions"
"I have read and agree to the Data Security Information"
"Please click on the confirmation link to log in to your account."
"We e-mailed you a new confirmation PIN. Resending is only available once. "
"We have sent a verification PIN to your address %s"
"Unfortunately, something went wrong. Please try again."
"This e-mail address has not been confirmed yet."
"We have sent a reset link to %s. Please check your e-mail."
"Follow the instructions to quickly gain access to your account."
"You can easily set up a new password. We will e-mail you a PIN to do that. "
"We e-mailed you a new reset link."
"You can unlock your account by setting up a new password."
"Here you can find all the services offered by your city."
"Find the best marketplace deals in your city."
"You must be a resident to access all citizen services."
"The confirmation of your change of registration is available in your document safe."
"Your current location is not yet supported."
"Register to be able to use all services of the Citykey App."
"Submit applications or documents - quickly and conveniently via app."
"What\'s going on in your city? What is important? You can also share all events and news directly with friends."
"The Citykey app is your access to many cities. Simple and available at any time."
"Unfortunately, something went wrong. Please try again later."
"Information about the city could not be retrieved."
"What happens if I delete my account?"
"Unfortunately you will not be able to use Citykey specific features anymore."
"Confirm account deletion by entering your password."
"We\'re sorry to see you go. The good news is, you can continue using the guest features of the app."
"Unfortunately, we were not able to delete your account at this time."
"Please check your internet connection and retry."
"Unfortunately, something went wrong. Please check your internet connection and try again."
"Password and e-mail address may not be the same."
"Unfortunately, we cannot display your profile at this time. Please try again later."
"Unable to send the confirmation link, please try again."
"The new e-mail address matches the old one. Please use a different e-mail address."
"Your new and old password may not be the same."
"Unfortunately something went wrong and you were logged out. Please log in again."
"You have logged out successfully. Log back in or continue using the guest features of the app."
"Unfortunately, something went wrong. Please try again later."
"The events could not be loaded. Please try again."
"There are no categories. Please try again later."
"There are no events matching your criteria."
"Please use Face ID to access your account. You can manage the access rights of the app under the app\'s central settings at any time."
"We need permission to access the location services to detect the city name. You can manage the access rights of the app under the app\'s central settings at any time."
"We need the permission to add events to the calendar. You can manage the access rights of the app under the app\'s central settings at any time."
"Location services are disabled. You can manage the access rights of the app under the app\'s central settings at any time."
"Face ID access denied. You can manage the access rights of the app under the app\'s central settings at any time."
"Calendar access denied. You can manage the access rights of the app under the app\'s central settings at any time."
"Unfortunately something went wrong. Please try again later."
"No calendar app was found. Please install and try again."
"Sorry we had a problem administrating your event favorites."
"Sorry, we could not load your favorites."
"Could not retrieve events at this time. Please try again later."
"Sorry, we couldn\'t mark the message as \'read\'.\nPlease try again later."
"Sorry, we couldn\'t mark the message as \'unread\'.\nPlease try again later."
"Sorry but this message couldn\'t be deleted at this time.\nPlease try again later."
"Sorry but your messages could not be downloaded at this time."
"Please try again later or reload page."

"To optimize your app experience, we use several services from partners. Within the scope of legal regulations, we, or companies commissioned by us within the scope of data processing, create usage profiles. Direct back tracing to you is not possible."
"These services can also be switched on or off later in \"Profile>Data Privacy Notice\"."
"Citykey would like to send you notifications"
"Push notifications can include banners, lock notifications, tones and vibrations. These can be configured in the settings."
"Your account has been locked for 5 minutes. Please try again later or reset your password."
"Please note, resending the confirmation e-mail is only possible once."
"Please note, resending the password-reset e-mail is only possible once. "
"The news could not be loaded. Please try again."
"Please enter the 6-digit PIN to complete registration. If you didn't receive the PIN, please check the spam folder."
"New cities are added all the time. If your city is not yet included, just check back later."
"You can now log into your account using your login details."
"Click here to turn ON the Location Services."
"Feel free to contact us and we'll discuss how we can add your city to the app."
"I would like to share the following with the team:"
"Services cannot be displayed at the moment. Please refresh or try again later."
"Services could not be refreshed. Please try again later."
"Please enable Location Services in your device settings."
"Please enable Location in your device settings."
"You can now log in into your account using your new password."
"Please enter the 6-digit PIN to log in with your new password. If you didn't receive the PIN, please check the spam folder."
"Are you sure you want to close the appointment process?"
"Citykey can assist you with this service by pre-filling the following form with data from your profile: e-mail, date of birth, postal code"
"Here you will find the imprint for the selected city."
"Each city you have selected has its own imprint and can be accessed below."
"This permission allows Citykey to access, store and use your device\'s location with the purpose of showing you relevant content and services."
"We were not able to identify your location."
"Sorry but your appointments could not be displayed at this time."
"This appointment has not been confirmed yet."
"Your Appointment \"%s\" will take place on %s at %s.%n%nYour requests:%n%s%n%nYour waiting number: %s%n%nAddress%nhttps://maps.google.com/?q=%s"
"Unfortunately we are currently not able to show news for the selected city."
"Unfortunately we are currently not able to show events for the selected city."
"Please try again or reload the page."
"If you change the address, your existing reminders will be deleted."
"The settings could not be applied. Please try again."

"
Unfortunately, the reminder function cannot be used because the required technology »MoEngage« has not been activated. 

Do you want to activate MoEngage?"

"
Unfortunately, the reminder function cannot be used because push notifications for Citykey are disabled.

Do you want to enable push notifications?"
"Are you sure you want to cancel the appointment?"
"Oops, your appointment could not be cancelled."
"Sorry but we couldn\'t mark the appointment as \'read\'.\nPlease try again later."
"The appointment couldn\'t be deleted at this time. Please try again later."
"This appointment cannot be deleted. You can only delete cancelled, rejected or expired appointments."
"Sorry but we were unable to load the surveys."
"Currently, there are no surveys to preview."
"Do you want to leave the survey? Your data will not be stored."
"You actively contribute to an improved quality of life in %s with your feedback. "
"You are about to start deleting your Citykey account."
"This action is permanent and you will no longer be able to access the features that are exclusive to registered users."
"Please note, it may take up to 48 hours until all your data has been deleted."
"We have sent a verification PIN to your e-mail %s"
"This service can\'t function without selecting a category. Please select one."
"Unfortunately, the city you have chosen is not available anymore."
"Please hold your eID card behind* your smartphone."
"You are about to identify yourself with the following provider:"
"After you have entered your PIN, the data listed above will be read out and securely transmitted to the provider. Citykey has no access to the data at any time."
"Unfortunately something went wrong. Please try again."
"Your PIN entry was incorrect twice. In order to continue, please enter the CAN (Card Access Number)."
"The CAN can be found on the front of the card, in the lower right corner."
"Your PIN entry was incorrect three times. Please enter the PUK now in order to continue."
"The PUK can be found on the document you received with your PIN."
"Unfortunately, you have entered the PUK incorrectly too many times. Your card is now blocked."
"Please contact the authority responsible for issuing your ID document in order to have your card unblocked."
"Wrong PIN. You have two more attempts left."
"Wrong PIN. You have one more attempt left."
"You can have your 5-digit PIN converted to a 6-digit one. To do this, you need the »AusweisApp2«."
"Is the connection to the card interrupted often?"
"Try to keep the card and your smartphone as still as possible."
"We recommend checking the extensive help page of the AusweisApp2."
"Go to the help page of the AusweisApp2"
"Do you want to exit the authentication process?"
"The appointment could not be deleted, please try again later."
"This appointment cannot be deleted. You can only delete cancelled, rejected or expired appointments."
"You have already participated in this survey."
"IMPORTANT: For privacy reasons, please do not enter any names or personal data of yourself or other persons."
"Please confirm that you have read and acknowledged our %s %s."
"I agree to be contacted by the city via E-Mail"
"With your submission you help us to improve the quality of life in %s."
"You will receive an E-Mail when there are updates on your request."
"Move the Map to the location of the defect. The defect is marked by the pin."
"Please enter the street name and house number by hand below."
"Unfortunately, you cannot cancel the appointment via Citykey yet. Please use the link you received in the confirmation email."
"The report could not be sent at this time. please try again later."
"If we are allowed to use your camera, you can report the defect more easily."
"If we are allowed to use your photos, you can report the defect more easily. "
"In order to allow Citykey to capture photos of the defect, please go to settings and allow the camera access permission. "
"In order to allow Citykey to capture photos of the defect, please go to settings and allow the photos access permission. "
"Citykey needs NFC to access the eID feature of your ID card in order to authenticate to eGov services."

"In order to provide you with an optimal app experience, we use various tools. This includes tools for the operation and optimization of the app and services, such as text and video chats, as well as tools for advertising oriented to your online usage behavior. These tools can, for example, tell us if you use our app repeatedly from the same device. We would like to give you the choice, which tools you allow:"

"These tools are strictly necessary to enable you to navigate the pages and use essential functions. They enable basic functions, such as sending of push notifications related to features of the app, and access to secured areas of the app. They also serve the purpose of performing an anonymous analysis of user patterns, which we use to continuously develop and improve our app for you."

"These tools help us to improve our understanding of how our apps are used. Analysis tools allow for the collection of usage and identification data by the original provider or third party providers and their compilation into pseudonymous usage profiles. We use analysis tools, e.g., to determine the number of individual users of an app, to collect technical data if the app has crashed, and to analyze the app’s usage patterns and user interactions on the basis of anonymous and pseudonymous information. This information cannot be traced back to a person."

"This app uses tools, for example in the form of SDKs (Software Developer Kit). They can store and read information on your device. By clicking on \"Accept All\", you accept the processing of your data according to our %s. Further information, including information on data processing by third parties, can be found in the settings as well as in our privacy information. %s you can continue only with the necessary tools."
"The image is too big. Please choose a different image."
"Failed to load image. Please try again"
"Are you sure you want to log out?"

"Would you like to help us improve our offer? Just give us a short feedback. If you wish to remain anonymous, please be careful not to enter any personal information. Your email address will only be shared with us if you agree to it below."
"Your feedback will help us to improve our app. Thank you again :)"
" Citykey has detected a jailbreak on your device. Therefore, the execution cannot be supported."
"Do you want to stay logged in, so that you don\'t need to log in next time you use the app?"
"You have been logged out due to inactivity. To stay logged in, just check the \"keep me logged in\" checkbox."
"Unfortunately something went wrong and you were logged out. Please log in again."
"Unfortunately, we could not find anything related to »%s«."
"Please select a pickup from the button above."

"Tap on the map to see more details"
"Some of the previously selected waste types are no longer available. Please select an alternative waste type instead."

"Move the map to the position where you would like to submit the suggestion. The suggestion is marked by the pin."
"You will receive an E-Mail when there are updates on your request."

"Thank you for contributing to the improvement of bicycle traffic and helping to shape the mobility transition in Bonn. The processing of your proposal will take some time. Therefore, we ask for your patience and understanding if your proposal is not feasible from a technical or planning point of view. You can check the status of your proposal at any time via the map (under \"View existing issues\")."
